import { useContext } from "react" import { ApiContext } from "../../context/ApiContext" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const JobsList = () => { const { allJobs } = useContext(ApiContext) const jobs = allJobs ? allJobs.map((job) => { return (

{job.payment_method[1] + job.payment_method[0]}

{job.date}

asd

asd

{job.title}

{job.description ? job.description.slice(0,300) + "...": null}

Icon description
) }) :null; return (
{ jobs }
) } export default JobsList
